title: Reorder 'The Future' section to after exercises
Update slide color theme to blue, white, and black
description:
Change the presentation color scheme from purple gradient to blue, white, and black.

Current State:
- Background: Purple/blue gradient
- Headings: Purple gradient
- Accent colors: Various purples and teals

Target Color Scheme:
- Background: Dark blue to black gradient
- Primary text: White
- Headings: Bright blue (#3b82f6)
- Accent/links: Light blue (#93c5fd)
- Code blocks: Dark with blue syntax highlighting

File to Modify:
- slides/css/styles.css

Specific Changes:
1. Update body background gradient to blue-black
2. Change h1/h2 colors from purple to blue
3. Update link colors to blue tones
4. Adjust code block styling for blue theme
5. Update subtitle and tagline colors
6. Ensure sufficient contrast for accessibility

title: Update workshop language for non-developer audience
description:
The workshop is intended for non-developers. Review and update all verbiage across the project to be accessible to people without coding experience.

Files to Review:
- AGENTS.md - Update terminology, simplify technical jargon  
- README.md - Simplify getting started instructions
- slides/index.html - Make slide content accessible
- docs/README.md - Ensure documentation is beginner-friendly

Guidelines:
- Replace 'developers' with 'participants' or 'learners'
- Add brief explanations for technical terms
- Use plain language over jargon
- Focus on what you will accomplish rather than technical details
- Assume no prior experience with AI, command line, or programming
